definition[0]: something that continues or follows something else that has happened before, without a stop or change
example[0]: The present economic policy is a continuation of the earlier one.
definition[1]: the continuation of something is the fact that it continues to exist or happen
example[1]: measures to ensure the continuation of food supplies
definition[2]: something that joins something else as if it were part of it
example[2]: The Baltic Sea is a continuation of the North Sea.
